dcterms:creator: Lam Pham
Dat Ngo
Tho Nguyen
Phu Nguyen
Truong Hoang
Alexander Schindler
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 341 videos collected from YouTube, presenting a total recording time of nearly 29.06 hours, annotated into five categories: ‘Riot’, ‘Noise-Street’, ‘Firework-Event’, ‘Music-Event’, or ‘Sport-Atmosphere’. The dataset is used to evaluate acoustic scene classification.
dcterms:title: Crowded Scenes

dcterms:creator: Annamaria Mesaros
Toni Heittola
Tuomas Virtanen
dcterms:description: A multi-device dataset for urban acoustic scene classification, comprising 8640 10-second segments with a total recording time of 24 hours, recorded from one device.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2018 Task 1A

dcterms:creator: Annamaria Mesaros
Toni Heittola
Tuomas Virtanen
dcterms:description: A multi-device dataset for urban acoustic scene classification, which reuses the DCASE 2018 Task 1A Development set and adds more data recorded from two other devices.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2018 Task 1B

dcterms:creator: Annamaria Mesaros
Toni Heittola
Tuomas Virtanen
dcterms:description: A dataset for acoustic scene classification that includes recordings from one device and additional recordings from two other devices, focusing on the issue of mismatched recording devices.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2019 Task 1A

dcterms:creator: Annamaria Mesaros
Toni Heittola
Tuomas Virtanen
dcterms:description: A dataset for acoustic scene classification that includes recordings from multiple devices, focusing on the issue of mismatched recording devices.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2019 Task 1B

dcterms:creator: Toni Heittola
Annamaria Mesaros
Tuomas Virtanen
dcterms:description: The largest dataset proposed for acoustic scene classification, comprising 23040 10-second segments with a total recording time of 64 hours, recorded from three real devices and additional synthesized recordings.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2020 Task 1A

dcterms:creator: Toni Heittola
Annamaria Mesaros
Tuomas Virtanen
dcterms:description: A dataset for acoustic scene classification that continues to evaluate the issues of mismatched recording devices and low-complexity models.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2021 Task 1A

dcterms:creator: Toni Heittola
Annamaria Mesaros
Tuomas Virtanen
dcterms:description: A dataset for acoustic scene classification that focuses on low-complexity models and evaluates the performance on 1-second segments.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2022 Task 1

dcterms:description: A derived dataset combining DCASE 2020 Task 1A and Crowded Scenes, presenting diverse scene contexts and sound events.
dcterms:title: 8-sound-scene-context dataset
